name: Resolve()
description:
Programming is cool ! (I swear)

Resolve is a small puzzle game in which you have to program to resolve puzzles. The purpose of this game is to initiate the player into the fundamentals of code.

I have developped a new programming language. All the puzzles are systemic, (almost) nothing is hard coded.

This is an in progress solo project, all by hand, for the end of my studies.

Example of in-game programmed system :

In this room, you need to have 0 object in the red zone and 5 or more in the blue one. Good luck and good code !
